pathfinding

Class Table

  • java.lang.Object
    • pathfinding.Table

  • public class Table
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to make and work with a border made of tiles

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Table()
      Default table constructor Generates a table of a specific size determined by the TABLE_SIZE parameter The terrain is randomly generated using a Perlin noise function After generating it, another function is called to properly set the edges of the tiles

      • valid

        public boolean valid(Node act)
        This function is used to determinate whether a node's coordinates are within a valid range in the table
        Parameters:
        act - is the node we want to checkPassable
        Returns:
        returns true if the node's coordinates are within a valid range in the table

      • valid

        public boolean valid(int x,
                     int y)
        Overload of the valid function, uses the numerical values for coordinates instead of a node
        Parameters:
        x - horizontal coordinate
        y - vertical coordinate
        Returns:
        returns true if the coordinates are within a valid range in the table

        y - vertical coordinate
        Returns:
